Class Queue

java.lang.Object
ServerClient.Queue
public class Queue extends Object

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Queue()
    Constructs a new Queue and initializes the currently processing index to the first item in the queue

      public Queue()
      Constructs a new Queue and initializes the currently processing index to the first item in the queue

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add​(Submission sub)
      Adds a new submission to the queue
      Parameters:
      sub - Submission object that should be added

    • remove

      public void remove​(int index)
      Removes a submission from the queue based on its index The index cannot be removed if it is currently being processed.
      Parameters:
      index - Index of the submission to be removed

    • remove

      public void remove​(String title)
      Removes a submission from the queue based on its title
      Parameters:
      title - Title of the essay submission to be removed

    • getStatus

      public String getStatus()
      Returns a string detailing the status of the queue
      Returns:
      A String mentioning the current index being processed relative to the size of the queue

    • getCurrentIndex

      public int getCurrentIndex()
      Returns:
      The index of the submission currently being processed

    • getQueueSize

      public int getQueueSize()
      Returns:
      The size of the queue

    • forwardCurrentIndex

      public Submission forwardCurrentIndex()
      Moves to the next item in the queue
      Returns:
      The submission currently being processed
